channel.title: Game keeps disconnecting
channel.description:
What happened: the game disconnected
What was SUPPOSED to happen: the game was supposed to stay connected
Steps to reproduce this issue: play the game
1. 2. 3.
sorry this is a bit vague . it has happened the last 3 games at random intervals . my connection seems stable . has only been happening today . has been fine for last fortnight
